abilities.name: Scar Charge
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put 3 damage counters on this Pokémon. If you do, search your deck for up to 3 Darkness Energy cards and attach them to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Crushing Punch
attacks.effect: Discard a Special Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Darkest Tornado-GX
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
